messages.subject: Re: Re Play dough
messages.msgSnippet: If you use pretzel dough it seems to work O.K.  If they know you re going to bake it,  the children tend to finsh a shape, letter, creation and get it on the
messages.messageBody:
If you use 'pretzel dough' it seems to work O.K. If they know you're going
to bake it, the children tend to finsh a shape, letter, creation and get it
on the cookie sheet to bake ....at least that's my experience.
Suz
-----Original Message-----
From: Thomas and Nanci Kuykendall <tn-k4of5@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com <Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, November 20, 1999 10:54 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re Play dough


>From: Thomas and Nanci Kuykendall <tn-k4of5@...>
>
>>You can also make any recipe bread dough and let the kids "playdough"
>>with it, then bake their creations and eat them.
>>Mary Ellen
>
>Really? It doesn't hurt the dough to have it "kneaded" so much, or cut
>into little pieces?
>
>Nanci K. in Idaho
>
>>Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
>Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com
>

messages.subject: Re: Re Play dough
messages.msgSnippet: ... Really?  It doesn t hurt the dough to have it kneaded so much, or cut into little pieces? Nanci K. in Idaho
messages.messageBody:
>You can also make any recipe bread dough and let the kids "playdough"
>with it, then bake their creations and eat them.
>Mary Ellen

Really? It doesn't hurt the dough to have it "kneaded" so much, or cut
into little pieces?

Nanci K. in Idaho

messages.subject: Re Play dough
messages.msgSnippet: You can also make any recipe bread dough and let the kids playdough with it, then bake their creations and eat them. Mary Ellen Snowflakes are on of nature s
messages.messageBody:
You can also make any recipe bread dough and let the kids "playdough"
with it, then bake their creations and eat them.
Mary Ellen
Snowflakes are on of nature's most fragile things,
but just look at what they can do
when they stick together.
>>>I never buy playdough anymore, the stuff we make is so much better.
it's not crumbly and you can make some wild colors.>>
